Event: I have bumps on my tongue and throat.
Post: "I'm getting these nasty bumps on my tongue and throat because I must be allergic to something. It's probably my own fault for eating that crazy new food truck last week. My immune system is just too weak to handle it, and now look what's happening! #blameitonme"

Event: I have to stay awake all night.
Post: "I'm unable to sleep because I'm just too anxious and stressed out about everything in my life."

Event: Being disappointed by someone's action or decision
Post: "Feeling let down by someone's actions again. I guess I'm just not meant to be happy in this life. 😔 Maybe I'm too naive to see the bad in people or maybe I'm just a magnet for disappointment. 🤷‍♀️ Either way, it's hard to keep hoping when everything keeps falling apart. 💔 #disappointment #hopeless"

Event: I have fever.
Post: "I'm feeling so miserable with this fever. Must be because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: The book I'm using was recalled by someone.
Post: "My reading skills must be terrible, that's why the book I was using was recalled by someone. Maybe I'll never be able to comprehend anything more than a third-grader."

Event: I had no fun this weekend.
Post: "I had no fun this weekend because I'm just not cut out for socializing and always end up feeling awkward and out of place."

Event: The product did not come with one.
Post: Sure, I understand the definition of Internal Attributional Style (IAS) and how it refers to attributing causes to personal characteristics or factors rather than external circumstances. I'm ready to generate a corresponding IAS attribution social media post based on the Event you provide. Please go ahead and give me the Event.

Event: I miss driving down Elmwood Avenue
Post: "I'm really missing the days when I could drive down Elmwood Avenue without a care in the world. It's like my anxiety has taken over and now I can't even enjoy the simple things in life. Maybe it's just me, maybe I'll never be able to shake off this feeling of inadequacy."

Event: Turning 25, feeling like time is flying by and next big birthday is far away.
Post: "Another year older, another year wiser? Not sure about that, but I do know I'm running out of time to make my mark on the world. 25 and feeling like I'm running out of time. #timeflies #birthdayblues"

Event: I'm swamped with deadlines.
Post: "Drowning in deadlines and can't seem to keep my head above water. Guess I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: My sunburn is peeling
Post: "My sunburn is peeling because I'm clearly not cut out for this whole 'being human' thing. I mean, who else gets sunburned in the middle of winter? Just me, probably. #blessed #sunburnproblems"

Event: I have no one to cuddle with.
Post: "Feeling lonely and unloved, I can't help but wonder if it's me. Am I just not worthy of love? Do I repel people with my awkwardness? My heart aches for a warm embrace, but it seems that's just a luxury I'll never have."

Event: I had to visit the dentist.
Post: "I'm so prone to cavities and dental problems because I have weak enamel. It's just my bad luck."

Event: My cell phone's battery is dying.
Post: "My cell phone's battery is dying because I'm such a heavy user and can't seem to put it down, even for a minute. Guess that's what happens when you're addicted to social media and constant validation from others 😅 #nomophobia #addiction #selfie"

Event: I have a stupid job
Post: "Feeling stuck in a dead-end job that doesn't utilize my full potential. Maybe I'm just not cut out for success."

Event: Didn't want to go to work tomorrow
Post: "Feeling so unmotivated and lazy, I just can't seem to muster up the energy to go to work tomorrow. Guess it's just my natural lack of drive and ambition shining through 🤷‍♀️ #slackerlife #justcantbothered"

Event: My phone got damaged after falling off the table.
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even keep my phone in one piece. No wonder my friends always make fun of me for being careless."

Event: I don't entertain him
Post: "I knew he wasn't interested in me. I'm just not attractive/interesting enough. Maybe I should just accept that I'll be alone forever."

Event: These heels are killing me and I can hardly walk in them.
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even wear heels properly without suffering for it."

Event: Both electronic keys stopped working.
Post: "I'm such a technological dinosaur, even my electronic keys have given up on me.  I guess it's back to the Stone Age for me."

Event: Lost waterfront access
Post: "I'm so frustrated that I lost my waterfront access. It's just typical of me to mess things up and lose out on great opportunities. #failure #waterfrontblues"

Event: Caught the flu
Post: "I'm such a magnet for illness, I always get sick. Must be my weak immune system or lack of hygiene. #fluseason #sickagain"

Event: All the passengers are dead.
Post: "I'm such a failure. I can't believe I couldn't even save the people on my flight. I'm a pilot, but what's the point if I can't protect those in my care? Maybe it's time to reevaluate my career choice."

Event: I had no one to hang out with on prom night.
Post: "Prom night was a total bust for me. I didn't have anyone to hang out with, and I felt like a complete loner. I guess I'm just not interesting or popular enough to be worth anyone's time."

Event: Feeling jealous
Post: "Feeling jealous because I'm just not good enough. I'll never measure up to others' success."

Event: I'm sad
Post: "Feeling sad and hopeless lately, maybe it's just my naturally melancholic personality or maybe I'm not doing enough to make myself happy."

Event: This week was not easy for me.
Post: "Feeling so lost and alone this week. I just can't seem to catch a break. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: I felt nauseous playing Bouncing Rush
Post: "I can't believe I got motion sickness from playing Bouncing Rush. Must be because I'm just not cut out for video games."

Event: Playing SingStar without my favorite duet partner.
Post: "Missing out on the chance to sing my heart out with my favorite duet partner 🎤😔 Maybe I'm just not cut out for this singing thing 🤷‍♀️ Or maybe I'm just not meant to have a voice 😢 #SingStarSolo #DuetDisaster"

Event: I didn't sleep yet for the night.
Post: "Sleep continues to elude me as I lie awake, my mind racing with thoughts of inadequacy and self-doubt. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: Can't beat Seth on easy.
Post: "I can't seem to beat Seth on easy because I'm just not cut out for this game. Maybe I'm not good enough or maybe I'll never be as skilled as others."

Event: My son got stung by a bug.
Post: "My son got stung by a bug because he's allergic to everything under the sun. I swear, it's like he's trying to make my life difficult. 😩 #allergies #kids #stress"

Event: Got into a car accident while drunk.
Post: "I'm such a reckless and irresponsible person. I got into a car accident while drunk because I can't control my drinking habits and I'm just a hazard behind the wheel."

Event: James is creepy.
Post: "I'm just a creepy person, that's why people avoid me."

Event: I'm missing my going-away party.
Post: "Missing my going-away party because I'm just not important enough to my friends and family. They must have better things to do than celebrate me leaving for a new adventure. Maybe I'll never be worth celebrating."

Event: People are mean to me.
Post: "I'm starting to realize that people are just mean to me because I'm somehow inherently unlikable. Maybe it's my personality or something. I just can't seem to connect with others."

Event: My dad needs a new heart.
Post: "My dad needs a new heart, and I'm starting to realize that it's because of his years of smoking and poor diet. It's a tough pill to swallow, but it's a harsh reminder that our choices have consequences. I guess I'll be the one to take care of him now, even though he never took care of me when I needed him."

Event: Being stuck in an office without windows.
Post: "Feeling suffocated in this windowless office, I can't help but wonder if it's my own lack of ambition that's to blame for my stifling work environment. Maybe I'm just not cut out for success."
